channel.title: Andiamo! at Al Zeina, located at Raha Beach Road in Abu Dhabi is the top address for fresh and contemporary Italian Style food in Abu Dhabi! Only fresh ingredients, prepared when you order are the basis for the best Pizza and Pasta in town.
channel.description: Andiamo! at Al Zeina, located at Raha Beach Road in Abu Dhabi is the top address for fresh and contemporary Italian Style food in Abu Dhabi! Only fresh ingredients, prepared when you order are the basis for the best Pizza and Pasta in town.

item.title: No title
item.description: Andiamo! is the contemporary and fresh Italian alternative in Abu Dhabi! We are located at Al Zeina at Raha Beach and serve our customers with best Italian food made only by fresh and the best ingredients. You decide what you eat!
